The Ultimate Canadian Grand Prix Experience

Few sports generate the thrills, glamour, and prestige of Formula 1™ racing. While avid fans of this global sport love to discuss which are the best and most entertaining stops on this worldwide tour, there is no debate about what makes Montréal so irresistible. It’s a cosmopolitan cocktail of French joie de vivre and sophistication with a twist of arts, music, and shopping. The city is a fantastic blend of old-world charm and modern culture. Streets are lined with chic boutiques, Parisian-inspired sidewalk cafés, and sleek hotels. From the cobblestone streets of Old Montreal to the glittering lights of the city coming to life after dark, Montreal seems to have it all. It’s as if the city was designed for a perfect F1 stop; come see why it is always one of the most popular cities on the F1 circuit.

Below you will find a suggested sample itinerary, please remember we will work with you to completely customize your preferred experience based on your tastes, desires and budget.
